name: Magicalmovie
0:
”Alexa, open magical movie”
”Alexa, open magical movie and suggest”
”Alexa, open magical movie and recommend”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: magical movie
des:
Magical Movie can suggest a movie name.

It can suggest a random movie.
It also has a feature to find a movie in popular language or movie done by specific movie star

To search a random movie: Just say 'suggest', 'recommend' etc...
To search with a specific language, say: suggest in 'English' (or any of your favorite language)
To search for a movie of a specific star, say: suggest for 'Tom Cruise' ( or any of your favorite star)

If you want a suggestion in only your preferred language, say set 'English'. 

Movies are searched from the TMDB API.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
